I am looking for Software Engineers with strength in C#, C++, or Java and are interested in relocating to Redmond at Microsoft's main Campus. Must have 2+ years of industry experience. Send resume to v-miovad@searchwizards.com  These are direct-full time roles! Please share.

Sorry I have been absent this past week. It did not feel right to post content or to talk about all the things we learned in our trip when so many people were still in shock and mourning. My heart goes out to any of you who had friends and family who were directly affected by what happened Sunday.

It has been a little hectic for us as well. Our TEEMA conference was at the Luxor in Las Vegas and started only a few hours before the chaos. All of us are safe, but many of us a little rattled. I was lucky enough to be able to get to my room with a few others, but there were a few of us locked out and sheltered for over 12 hours that night.  Everything happened so fast that it wasn't until I got on the plane home, that the realization of what had just occurred struck me. Coming home never felt so good yet so somber.
I am just so happy to be home and looking forward to getting back to serving all of you.

TEEMA Solutions Group Inc. (TEEMA) has become one of the fastest growing Staffing Solutions company in North America.   Our focus is delivering full-cycle staffing solutions, whether that is short term, contract or long term, permanent. We love our clients and we support them by placing quality people in the right position at the right time.  TEEMA is governed by rock solid values, a mandate to empower our members and a commitment to excellence. Our Members are the most tenured in the staffing industry, with deep and wide networks of talented resources. We are passionate about what we do. Our clients have access to a wealth of experience unsurpassed in staffing. We believe the future is about ‘disrupting our industry‘ and our rapid growth is evident of that (cited by Profit 50, Red Herring, INC 5000 and Branham 300).   Come join the revolution.
